mapper.select: select v.* from product_attribute_value v left join product_attribute a on v.attribute_id = a.id where v.product_id = #{productId} and v.is_del = 0 and a.is_del = 0 and a.type = 1

select a.id as attrId, a.name as attrName, v.id as valueId, v.value, a.type from product_attribute_value v left join product_attribute a on v.attribute_id = a.id where v.product_id = #{productId} and v.is_del = 0 and a.is_del = 0
